member.name: T:Au.Controls.AuToolStrip
member.summary: Adds to ToolStrip: 1. User can click a button when the parent form is not the active window. 2. A click does not activate the parent form if it has WS_EX_NOACTIVATE style. 3. Can show tooltips when parent form is not the active window. To enable it, the form's ShowWithoutActivation override must return true (it is called when need to show a tooltip).

member.name: T:Au.Controls.AuMenuStrip
member.summary: Adds to MenuStrip: 1. User can click an item when the parent form is not the active window. 2. A click does not activate the parent form if it has WS_EX_NOACTIVATE style. 3. Fixes some MenuStrip bugs.

member.name: T:Au.Controls.AuInfoBox
member.summary: Scintilla-based control to show formatted information text. To set text use the property. For formatting and links use tags: .

member.name: T:Au.Controls.SciText
member.summary: Functions to work with Scintilla control text, code, etc. A SciText object is created by AuScintilla which is the SC property.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.StyleMeasureStringWidth(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Measures string width.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.StyleClearAll
member.summary: Calls SCI_STYLECLEARALL, which sets all styles to be the same as STYLE_DEFAULT. Then also sets some special styles, eg STYLE_HIDDEN.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.StyleClearRange(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Calls SCI_STYLECLEARALL(styleFrom, styleToNotIncluding), which sets range of styles to be the same as STYLE_DEFAULT. If styleToNotIncluding is 0, clears all starting from styleFrom.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.GetStyleAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets style at position. Uses SCI_GETSTYLEAT. Returns 0 if pos is invalid.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.SciText.SC
member.summary: The host AuScintilla.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.CallRetPtr(System.Int32,Au.Types.LPARAM,Au.Types.LPARAM)
member.summary: Sends a Scintilla message to the control and returns LPARAM. Don't call this function from another thread.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.Call(System.Int32,Au.Types.LPARAM,Au.Types.LPARAM)
member.summary: Sends a Scintilla message to the control and returns int. Don't call this function from another thread.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.SetString(System.Int32,Au.Types.LPARAM,System.String)
member.summary: Calls a Scintilla message that sets a string which is passed using lParam. If the message changes control text, this function does not work if the control is read-only. At first make non-readonly temporarily. Don't call this function from another thread.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.SetStringString(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Calls a Scintilla message and passes two strings using wParam and lParam. wParam0lParam must be like "WPARAM\0LPARAM". Asserts if no '\0'. If the message changes control text, this function does not work if the control is read-only. At first make non-readonly temporarily. Don't call this function from another thread.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.GetString(System.Int32,Au.Types.LPARAM,System.Int32)
member.summary: Calls a Scintilla message that gets a string. Don't call this function from another thread.
member.param: How much bytes to allocate for Scintilla to store the text. If -1 (default), at first calls sciMessage with lParam=0 (null buffer), let it return required buffer size. Then it can get binary string (with '\0' characters). If 0, returns "" and does not call the message. If positive, it can be either known or max expected text length, without the terminating '\0' character. The function will find length of the retrieved string (finds '\0'). Then it cannot get binary string (with '\0' characters). The function allocates bufferSize+1 bytes and sets that last byte = 0. If Scintilla overwrites it, asserts and calls Environment.FailFast.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.GetStringOfLength(System.Int32,Au.Types.LPARAM,System.Int32)
member.summary: The same as , but always uses utf8Length bytes of the result (does not find length).
member.param: Known length (bytes) of the result UTF8 string, without the terminating '\0' character. If 0, returns "" and does not call the message. Cannot be negative.
member.remarks: This function can get binary string (with '\0' characters).

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.ClearText
member.summary: Removes all text. Uses SCI_CLEARALL.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.SetText(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Replaces all text.
member.param: Text.
Don't parse tags, regardless of SC.TagsStyle.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.AppendText(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Appends text and optionally "\r\n". Optionally scrolls and moves current position to the end (SCI_GOTOPOS).
member.param: Also append "\r\n". Ignored if parses tags; then appends.
Move current position and scroll to the end. Ignored if parses tags; then moves/scrolls.
Don't parse tags, regardless of SC.TagsStyle.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.LibAddText(System.Boolean,System.Byte*,System.Int32)
member.summary: Appends UTF8 text of specified length. Does not append newline (s should contain it). Does not parse tags. Moves current position and scrolls to the end.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.LibSetText(System.Byte*)
member.summary: Sets UTF8 text. Does not pare tags etc, just calls SCI_SETTEXT and SCI_SETREADONLY if need.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.GetText
member.summary: Gets all text.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.SciText.TextLengthBytes
member.summary: Gets text length. It is the number of bytes, not characters.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.LineIndexFromPosition(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets line index from character position.
member.param: A position in document text. If negative, returns 0. If greater than text length, returns the last line.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.LineStart(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets line start position from line index.
member.param: 0-based line index. If negative, returns 0. If greater than line count, returns text length.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.LineEnd(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets line end position from line index.
member.param: 0-based line index. If negative, returns 0. If greater than line count, returns text length.
Include \r\n.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.LineStartFromPosition(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets line start position from any position.
member.param: A position in document text. If negative, returns 0. If greater than text length, uses the last line.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.LineEndFromPosition(System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets line end position from any position.
member.param: A position in document text. If negative, returns 0. If greater than text length, uses the last line.
Include \r\n.
If pos is at a line start (0 or after '\n' character), return pos.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.LineText(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets line text.
member.param: 0-based line index. If invalid, returns "".

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.RangeText(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets range text.
member.param: If less than 0, uses 0.
If less than 0, uses TextLengthBytes.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.LineHeight(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets line height. Currently all lines are the same height.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.SciText.LineCount
member.summary: Gets the number of lines.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.AnnotationText(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets annotation text of line. Returns "" if the line does not contain annotation or is invalid line index.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.LibAnnotationText(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets raw annotation text which can contain image info. AnnotationText gets text without image info. Returns "" if the line does not contain annotation or is invalid line index.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.AnnotationText(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Sets annotation text of line. Does nothing if invalid line index. If s is null or "", removes annotation. Preserves existing image info.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.LibAnnotationText(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Sets raw annotation text which can contain image info. If s is null or "", removes annotation.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.RangeToFullLines(System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Moves 'from' to the start of its line, and 'to' to the end of its line. Does not change 'to' if it is at a line start.
member.param: Include "\r\n".

member.summary: SCI_DELETERANGE.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciText.InsertText(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: SCI_INSERTTEXT. Does not parse tags.

member.name: T:Au.Controls.AuScintilla
member.summary: This .NET control wraps native Scintilla control. This is not a universal Scintilla wrapper class. Designed just for purposes of this library and related software. Responsible for creating and initializing the control. Also used to set/change control properties. The ST property returns a SciText object that can be used to work with text, code styling etc.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.AuScintilla.ST
member.summary: Gets the SciText object that contains most Scintilla-related functions.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.AuScintilla.OnSciNotify(Au.Controls.Sci.SCNotification@)
member.summary: Raises the event.

member.name: E:Au.Controls.AuScintilla.SciNotify
member.summary: Occurs when any Scintilla notification is received.

member.summary: Sends a Scintilla message to the control and returns LPARAM. Don't call this function from another thread.

member.summary: Sends a Scintilla message to the control and returns int. Don't call this function from another thread.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.AuScintilla.SciLexerDllPath
member.summary: Scintilla dll path. Default is Folders.ThisApp + @"Dll\" + (Ver.Is64BitProcess ? "64" : "32") + @"bit\SciLexer.dll". If you want to change it, call this before creating first control.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.AuScintilla.InitBorderStyle
member.summary: Border style. Must be set before creating control handle.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.AuScintilla.InitUseDefaultContextMenu
member.summary: Use the default Scintilla's context menu. Must be set before creating control handle.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.AuScintilla.InitReadOnlyAlways
member.summary: This control is used just to display text, not to edit. Must be set before creating control handle.

member.name: T:Au.Controls.AuScintilla.ImagesStyle
member.summary: See .

member.name: F:Au.Controls.AuScintilla.ImagesStyle.NoImages
member.summary: Don't show images. The property is null.

member.name: F:Au.Controls.AuScintilla.ImagesStyle.ImageTag
member.summary: Display only images specified in tags like <image "image file path">, including icons of non-image file types.

member.name: F:Au.Controls.AuScintilla.ImagesStyle.AnyString
member.summary: Display images specified in any string like "image file path", and only of image file types. Then limits image height to 10 lines.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.AuScintilla.InitImagesStyle
member.summary: Whether and how to show images. Must be set before creating control handle.

member.name: T:Au.Controls.AuScintilla.TagsStyle
member.summary: See .

member.name: F:Au.Controls.AuScintilla.TagsStyle.NoTags
member.summary: Don't support tags. The property is null.

member.name: F:Au.Controls.AuScintilla.TagsStyle.AutoWithPrefix
member.summary: Let , ST.SetText and ST.AppendText parse tags when the text has prefix "<>".

member.name: F:Au.Controls.AuScintilla.TagsStyle.AutoAlways
member.summary: Let , ST.SetText and ST.AppendText parse tags always.

member.name: F:Au.Controls.AuScintilla.TagsStyle.User
member.summary: Tags are parsed only when calling Tags.AddText.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.AuScintilla.InitTagsStyle
member.summary: Whether and when supports tags. Must be set before creating control handle.

member.summary: Whether to show arrows etc to make wrapped lines more visible. Must be set before creating control handle.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.AuScintilla.Text

member.name: T:Au.Controls.SciTags
member.summary: Used by controls. Adds links and formatting.
member.remarks:
Links and formatting is specified in control text using tags similar to HTML. To enable tags, use .
//TODO

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciTags._ClearUserStyles
member.summary: Clears user-defined (through tags) styles. Max number of user styles is NUM_STYLES_EX (216). Need to clear old styles before new styles can be defined. This func is usually called after clearing control text.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciTags.OutputServerProcessMessages(Au.Tools.OutputServer,System.Action{Au.Tools.OutputServer.Message})
member.summary: Displays messages that are currently in its queue.
member.param: The OutputServer instance.
A callback function that can be called when this function gets/removes a message from os.
member.remarks: Removes messages from the queue. Appends text messages + "\r\n" to the control's text, or clears etc (depends on message). Messages with tags must have prefix "<>". Limits text length to about 4 MB (removes oldest text when exceeded).

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciTags.AddText(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets or appends styled text.
member.param: Text with tags (optionally).
Append. Also appends "\r\n". Sets caret and scrolls to the end. If false, replaces control text.
If text starts with "<>", skip it.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciTags.LibOnLinkClick(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Called on SCN_HOTSPOTRELEASECLICK.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciTags.AddLinkTag(System.String,System.Action{System.String})
member.summary: Adds (registers) a user-defined link tag for this control.
member.param: Tag name, like "_myTag". Must start with '_'. Other characters must be 'a'-'z', 'A'-'Z'. Case-sensitive. Or can be one of predefined link tags, if you want to override or implement it (some are not implemented by the control). If already exists, replaces the delegate.

A delegate to a callback function (probably you'll use a lambda) that is called on link click. It's string parameter contains tag's attribute (if "<name "attribute">TEXT<>) or link text (if "<name>TEXT<>). The function is called in control's thread. The mouse button is already released. It is safe to do anything with the control, eg replace text.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciTags.AddCommonLinkTag(System.String,System.Action{System.String})
member.summary: Adds (registers) a user-defined link tag for all controls.
member.param: Tag name, like "_myTag". Must start with '_'. Other characters must be 'a'-'z', 'A'-'Z'. Case-sensitive. Or can be one of predefined link tags, if you want to override or implement it (some are not implemented by the control). If already exists, replaces the delegate.

A delegate to a callback function (probably you'll use a lambda) that is called on link click. It's string parameter contains tag's attribute (if "<name "attribute">TEXT<>) or link text (if "<name>TEXT<>). The function is called in control's thread. The mouse button is already released. It is safe to do anything with the control, eg replace text.

member.name: T:Au.Controls.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Controls.

member.name: T:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GNode
member.summary: Base of GSplit, GContentNode (GPanel and GTab) and GDummyNode.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GNode.IsDocked
member.summary: Returns true if is docked in main window or in a floating tab. .

member.name: T:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GContentNode
member.summary: Base of GPanel and GTab.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GContentNode.HitTestCaption(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns true if x/y is in caption and this is visible and is a child of parent. For tabbed GPanel returns true only if x/y is in its tab button, unless there are no visible siblings. For GTab returns true even if on a tab button.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GContentNode.Show(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Shows in the most recent visible state. Activates tab group panel.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GContentNode.Hide
member.summary: Hides, does not close.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GContentNode.DockBy(Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GContentNode,Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GDockHow)
member.summary: Docks this GPanel or GTab in an existing or new GTab or GSplit. If need, creates new GTab or GSplit in gcTarget place and adds gcTarget and this to it. Else reorders if need. This can be a new GPanel, with null ParentSplit and ParentTab, dock state not Docked.
member.param: New sibling GPanel (side can be any) or sibling GTab (when side is SplitX) or parent GTab (when side is TabX).
Specifies whether to add on a GTab or GSplit, and at which side of gcTarget.

member.name: T:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GFloat
member.summary: Floating parent form of a GPanel.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GFloat.ShowWithoutActivation
member.summary: 1. Prevents activating window when showing. 2. Allows to show ToolTip for inactive window.

member.name: T:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GFloat._DockIndicator
member.summary: Calculates and shows transparent rectangles where the floating panel can be docked when dragging it.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GFloat._DockIndicator._OnFloatMoved(System.Drawing.Point,Au.Types.RECT@,Au.Types.RECT@)
member.summary: Everything is in _manager client area.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GFloat._DockIndicator._CalcDockRectPart(Au.Types.RECT,System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Returns the left, top, right or bottom half of r, depending on where p is in it. Sets _target.side.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GFloat._DockIndicator._CalcNewTabButtonRectInFullCaption(Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GPanel,Au.Types.RECT,System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Returns a half of r (gp full caption, not just tab button), depending on where p is (even if not in r). Sets _target.side.

member.name: T:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GFloat.DockTarget
member.summary: GFloat.Drag() and _DockIndicator.OnFloatDropped() return this if can be docked.

member.name: F:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GFloat.DockTarget.gc
member.summary: The target. Note: when dockAsTab is true, it currently may be tabbed or not; if tabbed, may be docked or not.

member.name: F:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GFloat.DockTarget.side
member.summary: Specifies whether to add on a GTab or GSplit, and at which side of gc.

member.name: T:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GPanel
member.summary: Contains single Control.

member.summary: This ctor is used at startup, when adding from XML.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GPanel.Visible
member.summary: note: this is not just !IsHidden. Returns false if in a hidden tab group even if IsHidden is false.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.GPanel._IsVisible(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns true if this isn't hidden and isn't in a hidden tab group.
member.param: And isn't an inactive tab.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.IPanel.Content
member.summary: The child Control.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.IPanel.Text
member.summary: Panel caption text. Also tab button text. If null or not set, uses control's Name property.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.IPanel.ToolTipText
member.summary: Tooltip text. If null or not set, uses Text (default - control's Name property).

member.name: P:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.IPanel.Image
member.summary: Image to display on tab button if it is too small for text.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.IPanel.Init(System.String,System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Sets commonly used properties. Can be used to avoid several function calls (Image, ToolTipText).
member.param: Tooltip text.
Image to display on tab button if it is too small for text.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.IPanel.Visible
member.summary: The 'get' function returns true if the panel or its tab button is visible. Returns false if it is hidden or its parent tab group is hidden. The 'set' function makes the panel visible, in the most recent state (docked or floating). Activates its tab button if need.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.IPanel.ReallyVisible
member.summary: Returns true if the panel is visible. Returns false if it is hidden or its parent tab group is hidden or it is an inactive tab.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.IPanel.Floating
member.summary: The 'get' function returns true if the panel is floating and not hidden. The 'set' function: if true, makes this panel floating and visible if it is currently docked or hidden; if false, makes it docked if it is currently floating and visible.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.GDockPanel.IPanel.Focus

XML file containing customized panel/toolbar layout. It will be created or updated when saving customizations.
Controls. Control Name must match the XML element (panel) name attribute in the XML.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.Sci.SCNotification.Text
member.summary: Converts textUTF8 to C# string. Returns null if textUTF8 is null. Don't call this property multiple times for the same notification. Store the return value in a variable and use it.

member.name: T:Au.Controls.SciImages
member.summary: Gets image file paths etc from Scintilla control text and displays the images below that lines.
member.remarks: Draws images in annotation areas. Supports text annotations too, below images and in no-image lines. But it is limited: 1. To set/get it use , not direct Scintilla API. 2. You cannot hide all annotations (SCI_ANNOTATIONSETVISIBLE). This class sets it to show always. 3. You cannot clear all annotations (SCI_ANNOTATIONCLEARALL). 4. Setting annotation styles is currently not supported.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciImages._ThreadSharedData.CompactCache
member.summary: If cache is large (at least MaxCacheSize and 4 images), removes about 3/4 of older cached images. Will auto-reload from files etc when need.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciImages.#ctor(Au.Controls.AuScintilla,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Prepares this variable and the Scintilla control to display images. Calls SCI_ANNOTATIONSETVISIBLE(ANNOTATION_STANDARD). Need it because will draw images in annotation areas.
member.param: The control.
Display images that are not in "<image "path etc"> tag. Then does not display icons of files that don't contain images. Then limits image height to 10 lines.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciImages.ClearCache
member.summary: Removes all cached images. Will auto-reload from files etc when need.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciImages.CompactCache
member.summary: If cache is large (at least MaxCacheSize and 4 images), removes about 3/4 of older cached images. Will auto-reload from files etc when need.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.SciImages.MaxCacheSize
member.summary: Maximal size of the image cache. Default 4 MB.

member.summary: Sets image annotations for one or more lines of text.
member.param: First line index.
Text that starts at line firstLine.
Text length.
Added all text (not edited or appended).
Position where the text starts.

member.summary: Parses annotation text. If it starts with image info string ("\x3NNN\n\n..."), returns its length. Else returns 0.
member.param: Annotation text. Can start with image info string or not.
s length.
The NNN part of image info, or 0.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciImages.LibAnnotationText(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Sets annotation text, preserving existing image info.
member.param: New text without image info.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciImages.LibAnnotationText(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets annotation text without image info.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.SciImages._GetTextRange(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies text range to BufferForText. If cannot get from-to length text, asserts and returns null. Does not validate arguments.

member.name: P:Au.Controls.SciImages.Visible
member.summary: Hides/shows all images, or changes the display style of annotation areas. Default is ANNOTATION_STANDARD (images visible). When hiding, it just removes images, does not hide text annotations (SCI_ANNOTATIONGETVISIBLE remains unchanged).

member.name: T:Au.Controls.Form_
member.summary: Can be used as base class for forms when you want to use correct dialog font and correct auto-scaling when high DPI.
member.remarks:
Sets these properties: Font = SystemFonts.MessageBoxFont; //usually Segoe UI, 9pt //default font of Form is MS Sans Serif, 8.25pt AutoScaleMode = AutoScaleMode.Font;
Form designer uses these properties as default. It also adds 'this.AutoScaleDimensions = new System.Drawing.SizeF(7F, 15F);', its OK. note: Never set font in designer if you want to support high DPI (AutoScaleMode = AutoScaleMode.Font). Because designer places the 'Font=...' line after the 'AutoScaleMode = ...' line, and then .NET does not scale the form.

member.name: T:Au.Controls.ScrollableControl_
member.summary: Allows to set/get scroll info and receive scroll notifications. This class exists because .NET ScrollableControl does not work when AutoScroll is false.

member.summary: Loads image and returns its data in .bmp file format.
member.param: Depends on t. File path or resource name without prefix or Base64 image data without prefix.
Image type and string format.
Use
member.remarks: Supports environment variables etc. If not full path, searches in .

member.name: M:Au.Controls.ImageUtil.BmpFileDataToString(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Compresses .bmp file data () and Base64-encodes. Returns string with "~:" prefix.

member.name: M:Au.Controls.ImageUtil.ImageToString(System.String)
member.summary: Converts image file data to string that can be used in source code instead of file path. It is supported by some functions of this library, for example . Returns string with prefix "image:" (Base-64 encoded .png/gif/jpg file data) or "~:" (Base-64 encoded compressed .bmp file data). Supports all formats. For non-image files gets icon. Converts icons to bitmap. Returns null if path is not a valid image string or the file does not exist or failed to load.
member.remarks: Supports environment variables etc. If not full path, searches in Folders.ThisAppImages and standard directories.
